entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
